intro.p: This node decomposes the input molecules into connected components and writes the components into the output table columns. The biggest component goes into the first column, the second biggest component goes into the second column, and so on.
The node is based on the Indigo cheminformatics toolkit.

fullDescription.option: The column that contains Indigo molecules.
Each of the new columns will be named with this prefix + number (1,2,3,..)
Flag for skipping molecule components. The node writes first components (in descending order by the atoms count) where the number of components is less or equal to the limit number parameter

ports.outPort: The same as input, plus the columns with the connected components
